import React,{useState,useEffect,useCallback}from'react';import api from'../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const WhatsAppStatus=()=>{const[status,setStatus]=useState({ready:false,status:'disconnected'});const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const checkStatus=useCallback(async()=>{setLoading(true);try{const timestamp=Date.now();const response=await api.get("/whatsapp/status?t=".concat(timestamp));setStatus(response.data.data||{ready:false,status:'disconnected'});}catch(error){setStatus({ready:false,status:'disconnected'});}finally{setLoading(false);}},[]);useEffect(()=>{checkStatus();// Verificar status a cada 30 segundos
const interval=setInterval(checkStatus,30000);return()=>clearInterval(interval);},[checkStatus]);const handleManualRefresh=()=>{checkStatus();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mb-4 p-4 border rounded-lg",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"inline-block w-3 h-3 rounded-full mr-2 ".concat(status.ready?'bg-green-500':'bg-red-500')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"font-medium",children:loading?'Verificando status do WhatsApp...':status.ready?'WhatsApp conectado':'WhatsApp desconectado'})]})});};export default WhatsAppStatus;
